page.title: 15Recreation Sport
page.content:
{Alan}My Dad likes to play darts.He has eleven darts.I say to him,"Hit the twenty with three darts.I bet you cannot hit it." He throws the darts,and hits the twenty every time.
{Sharon} My Dads sport is jogging.One Sunday morning my Dad said, "Would you like to go jogging" I said "Is Nicola coming ?" "No,she is busing in to Alnwick" I said "Good" Dad said,"What are you saying 'Good' for?" I said,"When ever a car comes past she will push me in to the middle of the road." "Oh,is that why you say 'good'?" "Yes." So I went to get my shorts and trainers.When my dad came downstairs I
